name: Fluff n Tuff
description:
Made as part of my Game Engine Wars YouTube Series. 

Side scrolling shoot 'em up based on the game by Rocky Mullet: Tuff Fluff: https://rockymullet.itch.io/vimjam2mullet

Devlog: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NXeouyuVRsI

If you use Construct 3 and would like to remake this game or see how I made it, you'll be able to purchase the game pack from my itch page. For access to all my art/music and game packs you can join my Patreon.
